dcterms:description: LAION-2B is an open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models, providing a diverse set of image-text pairs for various applications in machine learning.
dcterms:title: LAION-2B

dcterms:creator: Q. Cao
L. Shen
W. Xie
O. M. Parkhi
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: VGGFace-2 is a dataset designed for recognizing faces across different poses and ages, containing a wide variety of facial images for training and evaluation of face recognition systems.
dcterms:title: VGGFace-2

dcterms:description: SID (Specialized Identity Dataset) is a dataset used for training models to generate anonymized facial images by linking images of public figures with descriptive prompts.
dcterms:title: SID (Specialized Identity Dataset)
